flawed_nl_solution:
The guitar costs $100 every month for 12 months so it costs 100*12 = $<<100*12=12000>>12000
His dad is charging him 10% interest on the $12000 so interest comes to 0.1*12000 = $<<12000*0.1=1200>>1200
All total, Aaron will owe his father the price of the guitar, $12000 and the interest, $1200 so 12000+1200 = $<<12000+1200=13200>>13200
#### 13200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
